text: Fritz-Olof Thunberg (21 May 1925 - 24 February 2020) was a Swedish actor and director. He was known for his deep voice and for his radio horror programs such as Mannen i svart ("The Men in Black")."Olof Thunberg", Swedish Film Database, 2004, updated 16 December 2013 . He was also known as the voice of Bamse and Agaton Sax in children's movies and recordings. He also dubbed many Disney movies to Swedish. His granddaughter is environmentalist youth activist Greta Thunberg. Thunberg died on 24 February 2020 at his home in Nacka, Sweden at the age of 94.Skådespelaren Olof Thunberg är död ==References== ==Other websites== * "Olof Thunberg" at Nationalencyklopedin (registration required) * Category:1925 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Swedish movie actors Category:Swedish voice actors Category:Radio actors Category:Swedish television actors Category:Swedish movie directors
title: Olof Thunberg
